description: This file implements a basic container object for a Web Module, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions. It contains the constructor logic for the Web Module Container Object, setting up method pointers and inheriting from a base class.

classes.name: WEB_MODULE_CONTAINER_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the Web Module Container Object with its properties and method function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE WebMcoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs the Web Module Container Object, allocates memory, and initializes base object properties.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebMcoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Web Module Container Object, freeing resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebMcoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the container.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebMcoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the container object, setting method pointers and internal state.
